en-US.summary: Learn fun facts about the bible.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Bible Genius for a fact
Alexa tell Bible Genius to tell me trivia
en-US.name: Bible Genius
en-US.description:
Ask for Bible Genius, and learn about what really matters. Bible Genius provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Bible Genius" or "Alexa, open Bible Genius" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
